message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for a great price! I think you'll really love it.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the suggestion, but I was hoping to stay within my budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $75?
I understand you're on a budget, Bob, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer you a discount, but I need to make a profit, so I can only go as low as $85. What do you think?
